title.rendered: Smile Int’l Film Festival: A celebration of good cinema, culture and values from across the world

content.rendered:
The 11th edition of the Smile Int’l Film Festival for Children & Youth (SIFFCY), in partnership with the European Union, brought the magic of over 150 critically acclaimed films from 50+ countries to inspire and engage 50,000+ children in India. The festival took place at the Sirifort Auditorium Complex, New Delhi, and was celebrated simultaneously in 50+ locations across India.

SIFFCY is more than just a film festival—it’s a platform for children to explore their creativity and dreams. Through exciting workshops, masterclasses, and panel discussions, young minds get the chance to learn from some of the most talented filmmakers, storytellers, and industry professionals from around the world.

The festival is dedicated to nurturing young hearts and minds through carefully selected films that touch on important themes like gender equality, the environment, family values, friendships, aspirations, and the power of education, curated to inspire empathy and awareness in children and youth.
